front.title: Gordian dCBOR: A Deterministic CBOR Application Profile

abstract.t: CBOR (RFC 8949) defines "Deterministically Encoded CBOR" in its Section 4.2. The present document provides the application profile "dCBOR" that can be used to help achieve interoperable deterministic encoding. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/BlockchainCommons/WIPs-IETF-draft-deterministic- cbor.
